title: Lalla Vinde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Thai, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves a variety of all organic international cuisines with vegan dishes or ones that can be made vegan. Bread and pulla baked fresh daily. Wi-fi Shares space with main library. Finnish/Swedish/Fusion/conference/party catering available. Open sometimes on Saturday; please call or check website or facebook.
